# IRandomizationSource.NextIntInRange method

Gets the next Int32, constrained to a range.

```csharp
public int NextIntInRange(int minInclusive, int maxExclusive)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| minInclusive | A minimum value limit. |
| maxExclusive | An exclusive maximum value limit. |

## Return Value

An Int32.
